headline: PulteGroup announces pilot of robotic-assisted construction
summary: PulteGroup (PHM) continued to test new technologies with the pilot of robotic-assisted construction. The test was conducted in the company’s DiVosta community of TerraWalk at Babcock Ranch .PulteGroup partnered with Australian-based FBR for this demonstration and utilized its Hadrian X system, an AI-guided construction robot capable of building structural walls in a single day. The automated system uses an advanced robotic arm to place concrete blocks that are secured using a specialized adhesiv
